However, these tests are not funded 
by the NHS and must be funded 
privately. At time of printing these 
tests cost between £50-£250.
You will be weighed at the booking 
appointment, but you probably will 
not be weighed regularly during 
your pregnancy. Your height will be 
measured along with your weight so 
that your midwife can calculate your 
BMI (body mass index). Most women 
put on between 10 and 12.5kg 
(22–28lbs)	in	pregnancy,	most	of	
it after the 20th week. Much of the
